ygData.messageBody:
On Tue, 25 Jan 2000, Reece, Tom - 25IDL G4 wrote:
>
> Do normal bard melee attacks even interrupt a caster? I was always under the
> impression that the only melee attack that would interrupt spellcasting was a
> bash/slam. For several levels now I have dual wielded thulian claws (DLY 19)

Yes, normal melee attacks can interrupt a caster.
Unfortunately, the biggest factor in doing this seems to be
level. I interrupt green casters most of the time with just
my melee attacks. I'll interrupt a blue caster with melee
maybe once or twice a night.

--
